price: (Rabbiin) gantuu ijootaa ni beeka. waan qomoowwan dhoksitus.
arabic: يَعۡلَمُ خَآئِنَةَ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنِ وَمَا تُخۡفِي ٱلصُّدُورُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yaʿlamu khāinata al-aʿyuni wamā tukh'fī al-ṣudūru
